document_data.mainbody:
Sleeping potions were magical potions that could be found in Zakhara, the Land of Fate. They were only carried or used by holy slayers.
Sleeping potions had a tart taste.
After imbibing this potion, the imbiber fell into a peaceful sleep for a few hours. Sleep from this potion had the safe positive effects of a full nights rest thus, this potion was often used by spellcasters to rapidly increase the rate at which they could re-memorize spells. Being woken during this sleep nullified any of these positive effects.
